name: Special A.
description:
Special A. is a shooting platform game in which you fight against aliens in order to get the final star. It has 3 levels and a boss. The real challenge is to see how many bullets you spend the game with and in what time. Developed years ago for a fair with my friend Arturo, it has now returned, intact so that the experience of the past is not lost.

Controls: Move with the arrows and shoot with the spacebar. Have fun!

Programming: David Huaraz

- Channel about indie game development: Aquí David

- Itch.io page: Aquí David profile

Drawings and sprites: Arturo Paredes

Music: The music of this game does not belong to us
